data.title: 50 Celebrities Who Have Been Married More Than Once
data.meta_description: These are the Hollywood elite who have said 'I do' on more than one occasion.
data.text:
Ideally, we're all searching for that one person to spend the rest of our lives with—however long that may take. But for some, specifically many Hollywood A-listers, tying the knot more than once (or twice, or three times) is a just a regular part of life. Click through to see which of your favorite celebrities have walked down the aisle several times.

Madonna

Madonna first tied the knot with Sean Penn (1) in 1985 when the two of them were both relatively new on the Hollywood scene. She even dedicated her third album, True Blue, to Penn the year that followed. Their romance only lasted about four years before the singer filed for divorce in 1989. More than a decade passed before Madonna said "I do" to English filmmaker, Guy Ritchie (2.) Their marriage lasted eight years before Madonna filed for divorce in 2008.

Kim Kardashian West

Kim Kardashian West eloped with music producer Damon Thomas (1) in 2000 and they divorced in 2004. Her second marriage was to basketball player Kris Humphries (2) in 2011, and after just 72 days of marriage she filed for divorce. Kim went on to marry her third husband, Kanye West (3) in 2014 and they have a daughter and son together.

Reese Witherspoon

Reese Witherspoon married her first husband Ryan Phillippe (1) in 1999 and they had two daughters and a son together before divorcing in 2007. Witherspoon married her second husband, Jim Toth (2) in 2011 with whom she has another son.

Britney Spears

Britney Spears had a brief first marriage (it lasted just over two days) to her childhood friend Jason Alexander (1) in January of 2004 after getting hitched in Las Vegas. After the annulment, Spears went on to marry Kevin Federline (2) later that year. They were together until 2007 and have two children.

Ryan Reynolds

Ryan Reynolds tied the knot with his first wife, Scarlett Johansson (1) in 2008 and they separated in 2010. Reynolds married his second wife, Blake Lively (2) in 2012 and the couple now has two daughters.

Jennifer Aniston

Jennifer Aniston was famously married to Brad Pitt (1) from 2000 to 2005. Aniston then started dating Jason Theroux (2) in 2011 and the couple wed in 2015.

Russell Brand

Russell Brand tied the knot with his first wife, Katy Perry (1), in 2010 and the two were separated in 2011. Brand then went on to marry his second wife, Laura Gallacher (2), earlier this year.

Angelina Jolie

Angelina Jolie met her first husband, Jonny Lee Miller (1), on set while filming the movie Hackers. They were together from 1996 to 1999. Jolie then met Billy Bob Thornton (2) while filming Pushing Tin. The two of were married from 2000 to 2003 and famously wore vials of one another’s blood around their neck. Jolie met her third husband Brad Pitt (3) while filming Mr. & Mrs. Smith in 2005. The two were married from 2014 to 2016.

Scarlett Johansson

The actress was briefly married to Ryan Reynolds (1) from 2008 to 2011 before marrying her second husband, Romain Dauriac (2) in 2014. They divorced in September.

Ashton Kutcher

Ashton Kutcher was married to Demi Moore (1) from 2005 to 2013. He married his second wife, Mila Kunis (2), in 2015. They have two children together.

Nicole Kidman

The actress was married to her first husband, Tom Cruise (1) from 1990 to 2001 and they have two children together. Kidman then married country singer, Keith Urban (2), in 2006 and they have two daughters together.

George Clooney

George Clooney was married to Talia Balsam (1) from 1989 to 1993 before marrying his second wife, Amal Alamuddin (2), in 2014. Their twins were born in June of 2017.

Drew Barrymore

Drew Barrymore married her first husband, Jeremy Thomas (1), in 1994 and filed for divorce two months later. Barrymore then married comedian Tom Green (2) in 2001 and their marriage lasted about a year before they called it quits. Barrymore met her third husband, Will Kopelman (3), in 2012 until they announced their divorce in 2016.

Jennifer Lopez

Jennifer Lopez first tied the knot with Cuban actor Ojani Noa (1) in 1997. Their relationship ended in divorce a year later. Lopez was married to her former backup-dancer, Cris Judd (2), from 2001 to 2002. Following her divorce, she started dating Marc Anthony (3) and the two wed in June of 2004. Lopez and Anthony have twins, Maximilian and Emme, together and though they finalized their divorced in 2014, they remain friends.

Johnny Depp

Johnny Depp was married to first wife Lori Anne Allison (1) from 1983 to 1985. He met his second wife, Amber Heard (2) on the set of The Rum Diary in 2011, and they were married from 2015 to 2017.

Kris Kardashian

Kris Kardashian married lawyer Robert Kardashian (1) in 1978. They divorced in 1991. Just one month after their divorce was finalized, she married Bruce Jenner (2, now Caitlyn Jenner) and they were together until 2015.

Kate Winslet

Kate Winslet met her first husband, Jim Threapleton (1), on set while filming Hideous Kinky, a movie in which she starred and he assistant directed. They were married from 1998 to 2001 and share a daughter, Mia. Winslet married director Sam Mendes (2) in 2003 and had a son, Joe. They divorced in to 2011. Winslet met her third husband, Ned Rocknroll (3), while vacationing in 2011. The couple tied the knot in 2012 and their son, Bear, was born the next year.

Mariah Carey

Mariah Carey first tied the knot in 1993 with music executive Tommy Mottola (1), who she was married to until 1998. Carey then met Nick Cannon (2) while shooting the music video for her song “Bye Bye” in 2008. They married that year and their twins were born in 2011. Cannon filed for divorce in 2014.

Tom Cruise

Tom Cruise first married actress Mimi Rogers (1) in 1987. They divorced in 1990 and Cruise met his second wife, Nicole Kidman (2) on the set of their film Days of Thunder. They were married at the end of 1990 and adopted two children together before their divorce in 2001. Cruise then married his third wife, Katie Holmes (3), in 2006 after the birth of their daughter, Suri, and they were together until 2012.

Ashlee Simpson

Ashlee Simpson was first married to Pete Wentz (1) from 2008 to 2011. They have one child together. She married Evan Ross (2) in 2014 and they have a daughter together.

Will Arnett

Will Arnett was briefly married to Penelope Ann Miller (1) from 1994 to 1995 before marrying his second wife, Amy Poehler (2), in 2003. The couple had two children before divorcing in 2016.

Carmen Electra

Carmen Electra was briefly married to her first husband, Dennis Rodman (1) from 1998 to 1999 before marrying her second husband, Dave Navarro (2) in 2003. The two were together until 2007, when they filed for divorce.

Blake Shelton

Blake Shelton married his longtime girlfriend, Kaynette Williams (2) in 2003 and they were together three years before divorcing. Shelton then married his second wife and fellow country singer, Miranda Lambert, in 2011 and they were together until 2015.

Halle Berry

Halle Berry married her first husband, baseball player David Justice (1) in 1993. They were together three years before divorcing. Berry went on to marry her second husband, Eric Benét (2) in 2001 and divorced in 2005. Berry tied the knot with her third husband, Olivier Martinez (3) in 2013 and the two were together until 2016.

Heidi Klum

The supermodel married stylist Ric Pipino (1) in 1997 and they divorced in 2002. Klum tied the knot with her second husband, Seal (2), in 2004. They were together until 2014 and have four children together.

Alec Baldwin

Alec Baldwin married Kim Basinger (1) in 1993. The couple had a daughter before divorcing in 2002. Baldwin married his second wife Hilaria Baldwin (2) in 2012. The couple have three children and are expecting a baby boy in the spring of 2018.

Nick Lachey

Nick Lachey was married to his first wife, Jessica Simpson (1), from 2002 to 2006. Lachey married his second wife, Vanessa [Minnillo] Lachey (2) in 2011 and they have three children together.

Uma Thurman

The actress was married to Gary Oldman (1) from 1990 t0 1992 before marrying her second husband, Ethan Hawke (2), in 1998. Thurman and Hawke had two children together before divorcing in 2005.

Janet Jackson

Janet Jackson was married to James DeBarge (1) briefly from 1984 to 1985. Jackson went on to marry René Elizondo Jr. (2) in 1991 and they were married for nine years before separating. Jackson wed her third husband, Wissam Al Mana (3), in 2012. They welcomed a son in January 2017 and are now separated.

Tom Hanks

Tom Hanks was married to American actress Samantha Lewes (1) from 1978 to 1987 and the couple had two children together. Hanks tied the knot with Rita Wilson (2) in 1998 and they also have two children together.

Matt Lauer

Matt Lauer was first married to television producer Nancy Alspaugh (1) from 1981 to 1988. Lauer went on to marry Dutch model Annette Roque (3) in 1998 and the couple have three children together.

Robin Wright

Robin Wright was first married to actor Dane Witherspoon (1) from 1986 to 1988. Wright married Sean Penn (2) in 1996 and they had two children together before their divorce in 2010.

Harrison Ford

Harrison Ford was first married to Mary Marquardt (1) from 1964 to 1979. He married his second wife, Melissa Mathison (2) in 1983 and they divorced in 2004. Ford tied the knot with his third wife, actress Calista Flockhart (3), in 2010.

Paul McCartney

Paul McCartney was married his first wife, Linda McCartney (1) in 1969 and the couple had four children. She died in 1998. The singer went on to marry Heather Mills (2) in 2002 and they had one child together. They separated in 2008 and McCartney married his third wife, Nancy Shevell (3) in 2011.

Jessica Simpson

Jessica Simpson was married to Nick Lachey (1) from 2002 to 2006. Simpson went on to marry NFL player Eric Johnson (2) in 2014 and they have two children together.

Nicolas Cage

Nicolas Cage was married to actress Patricia Arquette (1) from 1995 to 2001. The actor went on to marry Lisa Marie Presley (2) in 2002 and they divorced in 2004. Cage married his third wife, Alicia Kim (3) in 2004 and they have one child together.

Melanie Griffith

Melanie Griffith married Don Johnson (1) in 1976 when she was just eighteen years old. Their marriage lasted only six months. She married Steven Bauer (2) in 1981 and they had one son. They were together until 1989. Griffith married Don Johnson (3) for a second time in 1989 and the two had a daughter, Dakota, before divorcing in 1996. Griffith married her fourth husband, Antonio Banderas (4), in 1996 and the two were together until 2015.

Eddie Cibrian

Eddie Cibrian married former model and reality TV star, Brandi Glanville (1), in 2001. The couple had two sons before separating in 2009. Cibrian married country singer LeAnn Rimes (2) in 2011.

Mario Lopez

After six years of dating, Mario Lopez was briefly married to his first wife Ali Landry (2) in 2004 before marrying his second wife, Courtney Mazza (2), in 2012. They have two children together.

Eva Longoria

The actress was first married to Tyler Christopher (1) from 2002 to 2004. Longoria then wed NBA player Tyler Parker (2) in 2007 and they separated in 2011. Longoria married her third husband, José Bastón (3), just last year.

Liza Minnelli

The actress and singer was first married to Peter Allen (1) from 1967 to 1974. She was married to her second husband, Jack Haley Jr. (2), from 1974 to 1979, and her third husband, Mark Gero (3), from 1979 to 1992. Minnelli’s fourth marriage was to David Gest (4) in 2002 and the couple were married until 2007.

Shannen Doherty

The actress was briefly married to Ashley Hamilton (1) for a year from 1993 to 1994 before marrying her second husband, Rick Salomon (2), in 2002.The couple were only together a year before divorcing. Doherty then went on to marry Kurt Iswarienko (3) in 2011.

Patricia Arquette

The actress was married to Nicolas Cage (1) from 1995 to 2001 before she married her second husband, Thomas Jane (2), in 2006. They were together until 2011.

Jane Fonda

Jane Fonda was married to her first husband, Roger Vadim (1), from 1965 to 1973 before marrying her second husband, Tom Hayden (2) in 1973. The couple was together until 1990. She married her third husband, Ted Turner (3), in 1991. They divorced in 2001.

Christie Brinkley

Christie Brinkley first married artist Jean-Francois Allaux (1) in 1973. The marriage ended in 1981. Brinkley went on to marry Billy Joel (2) in 1985; they divorced in 1994 and had one child together. Brinkley was briefly married to Richard Taubman (3) from 1994 to 1995 and they also had one child together. In 1996 Brinkley married her fourth husband, Peter Cook (4), and they divorced in 2008.

Geena Davis

Geena Davis was married to her first husband, Richard Emmolo (1), from 1982 to 1983. She was married to Jeff Goldblum (2) from 1987 to 1990. Her third marriage, to Renny Harlin (3), lasted from 1993 to 1998 and her fourth marriage was to Reza Jarrahy in 2001.

Marc Anthony

Marc Anthony was married briefly for two years to his first wife, Maria Von Ritchie Lopez (1) until they divorced in 2000 and he married Dayanara Torres (2) later that year. Anthony married Jennifer Lopez (3) in 2004 and the couple were together for ten years before separating. Anthony married his fourth wife, Shannon De Lima (4), in 2014 and they were together until 2016.

Demi Moore

Demi Moore married singer Freddy Moore (1) in 1980 when she was only 17 years old. The two were together five years before they divorced and Moore went on to marry Bruce Willis (2) in 1987, They have three daughters—Rumer, Scout and Tallulah—together. They divorced in 2000 and Moore went on to date Ashton Kutcher, whon she eventually married in 2005. The two were together seven years before they divorced in 2013.

Pamela Anderson

The actress and model married Tommy Lee (1) in 1995. They had two sons, Brandon and Dylan, before divorcing in 1998. The Baywatch star was then linked to Kid Rock (2), to whom she was married briefly from 2006 to 2007. Anderson’s third marriage was to her longtime friend, Rick Salomon (3), from 2007 to 2008 and then again in 2014. They divorced again a year later.

Zooey Deschanel

Zooey Deschanel was first married to Ben Gibbard (1) from 2009 to 2012. She married her second husband, Jacob Pechenik (2), in 2015 and they have two children together.

You Might Also Like
